title: This Portfolio
summary: An ongoing project for several months using React & Tailwind
details: I decided to go with React + vite (JS) with Tailwindcss for my Portfolio as we had just been learning React when we were gonna start building our Portfolios.
The design part of the portfolio started in August of 2025, using Figma to set up Wireframes and over the course of the month experimenting and building out our designs.
Portfolios are ever evolving, so even though I've made it during my stay at Kodehode, I'll still continue to update and tweak it going forward.

title: Gutendex React App
summary: As the final React assingment we were tasked to make a book finder app using the Gutendex API

title: Match 2 React App
summary: As a project spanning a couple of days, we were told to make a match 2 memory game using React

title: Jokes & Useless Facts
summary: Small API assignment to utilize any free publicly available APIs

title: Recipe Archive
summary: I decided to go with a recipe archive when we got an assignment to utilize LocalStorage

title: Movable Object
summary: Small project to make a movable object on the screen using Javascript

title: Bubble Popping
summary: Simple assignment in DOM manipulation using Javascript

title: CSS Animations
summary: Made a small website for Kristiansund municipality for showing off some animation and transition knowledge

title: Confetti
summary: Small assignment to make a confetti button

title: Frontend Mentor Challenge
summary: We were tasked to do the Frontend mentor testimonial grid challenge

title: To-do list
summary: Extra Assingment to make a todo-list using an API
details: We had the option to take some extra assignments during the course, and this is one of them.
We were given a couple of JavaScript files to utilize to manipulate the DOM to dynamically populate a pre-set to-do list based on some fetched data.

title: Craftsvilla
summary: Progress after about one month into the course
details: This was an assignment after about a month into Kodehode's curriculum, having being taught HTML and basic CSS at this point.
We were asked to design a multi-page website for a fictional company called Craftsvilla, which was all about creativity and arts

title: First Assignment
summary: My first assigment done at Kodehode - Where my journey began.
details: Where my journey at Kodehode began at the end of May 2025.
Coming into the web developer course, I had some basic knowledge of HTML, CSS & JS after having gone through freecodecamp's curriculum a bit a year prior.
I started focusing on Python once I got to that part of their curriculum, so most of this project were done based on googling and the small amount of lectures we had during the first week.
The difference between my first week and now is quite stark - I've learned a lot during my time at Kodehode!
